name = "DataSource" value="<DataSource xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/SolarWinds.Reporting.Models.Selection">_x000D_linebreak <CommandText>select concat(e.ServerName,' - ID ',e.engineid) as ServerName, DATEADD(second, DATEDIFF(second, GETDATE(), GETUTCDATE()), rtg.date) as date, SUM(rtg.polls) as PingsInInterval_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakfrom SolarWindsOrion.dbo.Engines e_x000D_linebreakleft join SolarWindsOrion.dbo.nodes n on n.engineid=e.EngineID_x000D_linebreakleft join (_x000D_linebreakSELECT rt.nodeid, dateadd(MINUTE,datediff(MINUTE,'2000', rt.DateTime) / 5 * 5, '2000') as date, count(*)*rt.Weight as polls_x000D_linebreakFROM SolarWindsOrion.dbo.responsetime rt_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakWhere rt.DateTime ampersandgt; dateadd(day,-1,GETDATE())_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakGROUP BY rt.nodeid, dateadd(MINUTE,datediff(MINUTE,'2000', rt.DateTime) / 5 * 5, '2000'), weight_x000D_linebreak) rtg on rtg.nodeid=n.nodeid_x000D_linebreak_x000D_linebreakgroup by e.EngineID, e.ServerName, e.Nodes, e.Elements, rtg.date</CommandText>_x000D_linebreak <DynamicSelectionType>Undefined</DynamicSelectionType>_x000D_linebreak <EntityUri xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" />_x000D_linebreak <Filter i:nil="true" />_x000D_linebreak <MasterEntity>Orion.Nodes</MasterEntity>_x000D_linebreak <Name>24 hrs</Name>_x000D_linebreak <NetObjectId></NetObjectId>_x000D_linebreak <RefId>2cb90d30-df3a-428a-bd79-cb760d838404</RefId>_x000D_linebreak <Type>CustomSQL</Type>_x000D_linebreak</DataSource>" /><property name = "defaulttitle" value="Custom Chart" /><property name = "DynamicDataSource" value="False" /><property name = "SubTitle" value="" /><property name = "TimeFrame" value="<TimeFrame xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/SolarWinds.Reporting.Models.Timing">_x000D_linebreak <DisplayName>Last 24 Hours</DisplayName>_x000D_linebreak <IsStatic>false</IsStatic>_x000D_linebreak <RefId>e41dd3ea-78d0-4cfc-990f-e62e9f00c30c</RefId>_x000D_linebreak <Relative>_x000D_linebreak <NamedTimeFrame>Last24Hours</NamedTimeFrame>_x000D_linebreak <Unit>NotSpecified</Unit>_x000D_linebreak <UnitCount>0</UnitCount>_x000D_linebreak </Relative>_x000D_linebreak <Static i:nil="true" />_x000D_linebreak</TimeFrame>" /><property name = "Title" value="Poller Activity" /></properties></resource>
